stages.name: Arriving at the Cafe

script.speaker: Host
script.line: Great! You can sit anywhere you like. I'll bring you a menu.

ai_lines: Great! You can sit anywhere you like. I'll bring you a menu.
stages.tips: Respond naturally. Say how many people, thank them for seating you.

stages.name: Ordering Drinks & Food

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Hey there! How are you doing today?

script.speaker: Customer
script.line: I'm good, thanks! How about you?

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Doing well! Can I get you something to drink?

script.speaker: Customer
script.line: I'll have an iced coffee, please.

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Sure thing. Are you ready to order, or do you need a few more minutes?

script.speaker: Customer
script.line: I'm ready. Can I get the turkey club sandwich?

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Absolutely. That comes with fries or a side salad. Which would you prefer?

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Great, I'll get that right out for you.

ai_lines: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well! Can I get you something to drink?
Sure thing. Are you ready to order, or do you need a few more minutes?
Absolutely. That comes with fries or a side salad. Which would you prefer?
Great, I'll get that right out for you.
stages.tips: Order naturally: 'I'll have...', 'Can I get...'. Ask about what comes with your order.

stages.name: Receiving Food

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Here's your iced coffee and turkey club with fries. Can I get you anything else?

script.speaker: Customer
script.line: This looks great. I'm all set for now.

ai_lines: Here's your iced coffee and turkey club with fries. Can I get you anything else?
stages.tips: Keep it simple: 'Looks great!', 'I'm good', 'Thank you!'

stages.name: Finishing & Paying

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Glad to hear it! Can I get you the check?

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Here you go. No rush—whenever you're ready.

script.speaker: Server
script.line: Thank you! Have a great day!

ai_lines: Glad to hear it! Can I get you the check?
Here you go. No rush—whenever you're ready.
Thank you! Have a great day!
stages.tips: Ask for the check: 'Can I get the check?' or 'I'm ready for the bill'

stages.name: Llegando al Café

script.speaker: Anfitrión
script.line: ¡Perfecto! Puedes sentarte donde quieras. Te traigo el menú.

ai_lines: ¡Perfecto! Puedes sentarte donde quieras. Te traigo el menú.
stages.tips: Responde naturalmente. Di cuántas personas son, agradece por el asiento.

stages.name: Ordenando Bebidas y Comida

script.speaker: Cliente
script.line: Sí, un café con hielo, por favor.

script.speaker: Mesero
script.line: Claro. ¿Ya sabes qué vas a pedir, o necesitas un poco más de tiempo?

script.speaker: Cliente
script.line: Ya estoy listo. ¿Me das el sándwich club de pavo?

script.speaker: Mesero
script.line: Por supuesto. Viene con papas fritas o ensalada. ¿Cuál prefieres?

ai_lines: Claro. ¿Ya sabes qué vas a pedir, o necesitas un poco más de tiempo?
Por supuesto. Viene con papas fritas o ensalada. ¿Cuál prefieres?
stages.tips: Ordena naturalmente: 'Quisiera...', '¿Me das...?'. Pregunta qué viene con tu orden.

stages.name: Recibiendo la Comida

script.speaker: Mesero
script.line: Aquí tienes tu café con hielo y tu sándwich club con papas fritas. ¿Necesitas algo más?

script.speaker: Cliente
script.line: Se ve muy bien. Estoy bien por ahora.

ai_lines: Aquí tienes tu café con hielo y tu sándwich club con papas fritas. ¿Necesitas algo más?

stages.name: Terminando y Pagando

script.speaker: Mesero
script.line: ¡Gracias a ti! ¡Que tengas un buen día!

ai_lines: ¡Gracias a ti! ¡Que tengas un buen día!
stages.tips: Pide la cuenta: '¿Me traes la cuenta?' o 'La cuenta, por favor'

Can I get the turkey club sandwich?

en.description: Practice being a host/greeter. AI plays the customer.
ai_lines: Do you have a table by the window?
en.tips: Ask how many, show them to a table or tell them to sit anywhere!

es.tips: ¡Pregunta cuántos son, muéstrales una mesa o diles que se sienten donde quieran!
